title: Darkwing: First Darkness
description: The unfinished, gritty Darkwing movie you never got to see. Within every man, there is a war. Not of action, but ideas. There is no right or wrong. No heroes or villains. Only darkness. There is one man who can fight the darkness… with more darkness.
quote: You can’t just flap around in the night. You’ll terrify people!
altHero: Commissioner Haggard pleads with Darkwing on the roof
alt2: frightened people running down the street
alt3: the initials DW drawn with fire
